headline: IBD Stock Of The Day, Snowflake, On Artificial Intelligence Fast Track
summary: Snowflake stock has gained 44% in 2025 as Wall Street cheers CEO Sridhar Ramaswamy's moves to reboot its artificial intelligence strategy.

headline: Genesys Announces $1.5 Billion Investment by Salesforce and ServiceNow
summary: SAN FRANCISCO, July 31, 2025--Genesys®, a global cloud leader in AI-Powered Experience Orchestration, today announced $1.5 billion in new investment commitments from Salesforce and ServiceNow, with each company agreeing to invest an equal amount.

raw.headline: Genesys Announces $1.5 Billion Investment by Salesforce and ServiceNow

headline: Cloud OSS BSS Market worth $56,848.3 million by 2030 | MarketsandMarkets™
summary: According to MarketsandMarkets™, the Cloud OSS BSS Market size will grow to USD 56,848.3 million by 2030 from USD 44,206.3 million in 2025, at a compound annual growth rate (CAGR) of 5.2% from 2025 to 2030.

headline: Insurance Platform Company Evaluation Report 2025 | Salesforce, Microsoft, and SAP Drive Innovation with AI-Powered CRM, Cloud Infrastructure, and Scalable Policy Solutions
summary: The Insurance Platform Companies Quadrant provides an in-depth analysis of the global insurance platform market, spotlighting significant companies, cutting-edge technologies, and rising trends. This study evaluates over 100 firms, identifying 25 top leaders in the sector. As the insurance landscape rapidly evolves with digital integration, platforms are crucial in simplifying policy purchase and management across borders. headline: Oppenheimer Considers Merck & Co. (MRK) Agreement as Strong Endorsement for Veeva’s Vault CRM
summary: Merck & Co., Inc. (NYSE:MRK) is one of the most undervalued blue chip stocks to buy according to hedge funds. On July 21, Oppenheimer analyst Ken Wong noted that Outperform-rated Veeva announced that Merck & Co., Inc. (NYSE:MRK) has committed to Vault CRM. The announcement marks Veeva’s sixth enterprise pharma Vault CRM commitment. The firm […]
